name: TruSkin Vitamin C Serum – Anti Aging Facial Serum with Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E & More – Brightening Serum for Dark Spots, Even Skin Tone, Eye Area, Fine Lines & Wrinkles, 1 Fl Oz

other_info.Special Ingredients: Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E

about_this_item: SKIN BRIGHTENING SERUM: Vitamin C evens skin tone, neutralizes free radicals, and boosts collagen to improve vibrance and reduce dark spots, dark circles, fine lines & wrinkles
ANTI AGING FORMULA: Purposefully balanced blend with Vitamin C, botanical Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, Aloe Vera, Jojoba Oil, and MSM to help brighten, calm & protect skin
BETTER FORM of VITAMIN C: Highly stable, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate maintains potency for longer with less skin stinging than other commonly used forms of Vitamin C

SKIN FRIENDLY, GENTLE SKIN CARE: Fragrance free skin nourishment using vital nutrients, antioxidants and botanical actives to improve skin wellness, all in a vegan and cruelty-free formula without parabens and other harmful chemicals you don’t want

THE TRUSKIN DIFFERENCE: If for any reason you decide this product isn't a fit for your skin, we're here for you. Each purposefully balanced medley of key antioxidants, super-nutrients and nourishing botanical actives enhances efficacy and delivers skin-friendly benefits, without added additives or fragrances. The expiration date is printed on the barcode sticker attached to the packaging.

title: Verified Purchase
content: Great for use in the morning with face yoga! Tapping it in or patting it in instead of rubbing, seems to work best when i used this product. You need to use a moisturizer afterwards , though, because it is not extremely moisturizing and does not have a lot of slip unless you apply more product; but even then it evaporates quickly, and what happens to get left behind on the skin, absorbs but it's a bit sticky. If you don't want to use a heavy moisturizer on top of it or if you are skipping the sunscreen, you can spray on something light and moisturizing like rose water or glycerin water, and be good to go for applying your makeup or for bare-facing it. This serum does not have a huge scent, but what you can smell, is not at all offensive, which is perfect if you don't like a lot of perfumy fragrance close to your nose. If looking for a daily serum, this one is a good, clean one to have on hand. I don't notice a super plumping, hydrated, shiny, glow-y look from this product  like i see with some serums, but you do get a clean, brightened, natural, and bit of a dewy look with this product. Plus, it is consistently gentle. Hope you try it! It is truly a good, clean daily serum to have on hand! By the way, it gently smooths the back of your hands, too! Works nicely underneath a moisturizing hand cream.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023

I'm a 31 year old, who REALLY hadn't started putting too much effort into skincare up until recently. I already have the Vitamin C moisturizer and love it, so I decided to try the serum, along with the eye gel Truskin offers (I think it's referred to as Super Eye Cream Gel, and it's amazing as well; my under eye area is so smooth and my dark circls have lightened so much, in only about a months time.... And the results began immediately!).

title: Great texture and smell
content: Both products feel amazing on application and absorb quickly, and fully(no problems with makeup application after use!). Well, my skin did a "purge," I believe, which is apparently quite common when you begin any new skin care regimen, and I do already get cystic acne right before and during my monthly cycle around my chin, but I thought I'd email the company and just ask if possibly I'd chosen the wrong product for my partular skin type. I gave a little description of what my skin was doing, along with a little background information about myself to give them a better idea so they could advise me better, and I asked if maybe the tea tree serum would be more appropriate since I had the acne.

title: Verified Purchase
content: What I've received from Erica in return was so unexpected and so kind; the definition of above and beyond. Before anything else, her first instinct was to have me ensure with my doctor that these ingredients were ok for me to use with my treatment. It was something I hadn't even considered, and on top of that it no was a complete shock; a wonderful person, who was much more concerned about me as an individual, rather than making a sale! As I'm sure you all know, that's rare these days!  I checked with my doctor and my care team, and got back with her to let her know they didn't see anything wrong with me using the products... Infact they said they would highly recommend them because of how natural the products are! And though the company did NOTHING wrong, and I myself had mostly likely just chosen the wrong product for my individual skin type (or who knows; I'm still entertaining the idea of using both, alternating days maybe!), Erica then offered me a complementary bottle if the tea tree super serum (which was more expensive than this product...and again, they had no mistake to rectify!).  They had done nothing wrong; she was just that kind, and wanted me to be able to try it!  What a kind, honest and caring company! And thus far, ALL of the products are so amazing, and I hope to soon collect the entire line! I truly could not say enough good things about the products themselves, along with the unbelievably honest and caring customer service I have received. Definitely purchase this product!!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2024

title: ABSOLUTELY WONDERFUL!!!

title: It’s worth every penny
content: First of all let me start off by saying this is my second bottle of this serum. Here’s my story so you can understand a few things and reasons why I’m a customer for life. I’m a 34 yr old woman, who has endometriosis and PCOS. I don’t take birth control because although it gave me porcelain doll skin, everything else that happened to me while on birth control was miserable. It helped control my hormonal acne, and it helped me lose a lot of weight. I have been off birth control a full 3 years now. I have always had what I felt was “decent” looking skin. I had a bit of teenage acne growing up but never much where I felt I had to slab make up on every day. Now at 34, with cystic ovaries, I had to change things up in my routine. I started doing research and I’ve always liked and leaned towards things that were more natural with less alcohol and other horrible ingredients just bad for your skin. After my research of serums, toners and supplements. I chose TruSkin Naturals Vitamin C Serum. The fact that it also has vitamin E and Hyaluronic acid is major plus. The vitamin E is also great for helping scars face and help fight against aging as well. The thickness and consistency of the serum is matched perfectly. It is not greasy nor oily. I use a dropper full amount for my whole face and entire neck. My acne scars are mostly on my neck and it’s embarrassing. Having to wear make-up all the way down to my shoulders almost is horrible. With the bottle I noticed very quickly within less than a week that my fine lines faded, my acne not only basically cleared up but the scars did too. I kept getting compliments at work and from my patients and they asked what I used on my skin because it looked like a doll’s face. They would tell me my skin looked soft and smooth and it was. I Told them I use the TruSkin Vitamin C serum, along with Burt’s Bees Chamomile and Soap bark face wash. I have continued to have amazing results until hurricane/tropical storm Harvey hit. We lost half of our patients due to them losing everything as well and some relocated and others we don’t know. There was a company lay off and being someone who loves and is passionate in skin care and I’m a nursing student, and while trying to reach out about working from home to make it easier with my studies, I went to the actual TruSkin company site and sent a message asking about possible employment. The site and I believe business owner, Erica, responded kindly and so sweet. I had actually forgot I had sent that message at the time of the reply and the worst part was it looked like I was drunk while typing it. I lost my glasses from the flooding. Anyways, although she was unable to offer employment she was beyond so kind and compassionate and understanding during our correspondence and I was offered a free bottle of the serum to help compensate and I was so excited. I’ve never had that happen to me and I told her pretty much all I’ve said here on my long winded story. When I temporarily stopped using TruSkin Vitamin C serum due to Harvey my skin flipped out on me. I know it’s from stress and hormones. I received my bottle of serum yesterday and my bottle of the retinol moisturizer today. It’s crazy to say that the results are already amazing. I have sensitive skin. The serum feels amazing, the moisturizer feels great. It smells soft and no burning or stinging. I’ll update soon with pictures as promised. Thank you Erica, for the kindness you showed me and for having these amazing and natural products. I hope to use these as long as I can. Because just after a day and a half my skin has already shown the softness and smooth skin I had before that I received so many compliments on.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2017

title: Verified Purchase
content: Okay so I have been using this product now for about 4 days and honest to God I already see a difference in my face. I have seen a few dermatologists and asked them for an anti-aging skin care regimen (I am 24 years old). However, there advice was always basic and they just told me to use tretinoine cream for now and sunscreen. After doing my own research on the internet I found there is a lot more I could be doing to protect my skin. I also suffer from pimples here and there sometimes. So the last dermatologist I saw also recommended I use gly/sal 5-2 pads.
